item.title: The World of Footbag at Your Fingertips
item.description: Footbag.org connects the entire world of footbag.

item.title: German Footbag Open
item.description:
February 7-8, 2026 / Berlin, Germany --> event website Footbag Net Freestyle Jam 2-Square

It’s been a while since we last hosted an event, but the time has finally come again. FC Footstar welcomes you all to Berlin for the German Footbag Open 2026! The event will take place on the weekend of February 7-8 in the familiar gym at Palisadenstrasse 76-78. There will be competition in Net, as well as a Freestyle Jam. If there’s enough interest, we might have some Freestyle competition as well. And then there’s 2-Square, above all. Please register here: https://fcfootstar.de/cms/gfo2026/

Details:Schedule Friday, Feb 6th 21.00h Welcome Party at Kaschk (Linienstraße 40, 10119 Berlin) Saturday, Feb 7th 10.00h Players Meeting 10.30h Open Doubles Net 13.00h Lunch 13.30h Mixed Doubles Net 18.00h Net Finals Party t.b.a. Sunday, Nov 8th 10.00 Players Meeting (Singles Net) 10.30h Singles Net 12.00h Americano Doubles Net 14.30h 2-Square 16.00h Singles Final 18.00h Award Ceremony Shreds on both days, Freestyle competition t.b.a
  link

item.title: US Open Footbag Tournament
item.description:
June 13-14, 2026 / Portland, OR, USA (West Linn Willamette Park) Open, women's, and intermediate net events for singles, and doubles. Open Mixed doubles. Freestyle Routines, Doubles Routines, and Circle all at both intermediate and open level.

Come join us at the west linn willamete valley park 1100 12th St, West Linn, OR 97068. schedule and web site to to be attached soon


  link

item.title: 45th Annual IFPA WORLD FOOTBAG CHAMPIONSHIPS 2026
item.description:
August 10-15, 2026 / Tsukuba, Ibaraki, Japan (Tsukuba Capio) The following events are currently planned (subject to change and final confirmation): [NET EVENTS] Doubles (Open, Women, Intermediate, Master); Mixed; Singles (Open, Women, Intermediate, Master). [FREESTYLE EVENTS] Request contest; Sick 3; Last man standing; Battles (Open, Women*, Intermediate*); Circle contest (Open, Women*, Intermediate*); Routines (Open, Women*, Intermediate*, Doubles*, Doubles mixed*). (*Events marked with an asterisk will be held only if there are enough participants.) Shred 30 [UNOFFICIAL EVENTS] 2 square and Golf. Please note that the schedule and specific event categories are still being finalized and may be updated. Detailed information will be available on the official website soon.

We are proud to announce that the World Footbag Championships 2026 will be held at Tsukuba Capio in Tsukuba City, Ibaraki, Japan. Top players from across the globe will compete in Freestyle and Net events. Detailed schedule and further information will be updated on the official website soon. We look forward to welcoming the world's footbag community to Japan!

Details:The detailed schedule, hotel information, and transportation guide to Tsukuba Capio will be updated shortly on the official website. Tsukuba is conveniently accessible from Narita and Haneda airports via airport shuttle buses or trains.
  link
